mapper.insert: insert into pop_board (pop_title, emp_id, pop_content, pop_is_active, pop_write_date, pop_updated_date) values (#{title}, #{empId}, #{content}, #{boardActive}, #{writeDate}, #{updatedDate})
insert into pop_period (pop_seq, period_type, start_date, end_date, montly_day, weekly_day) values (#{popSeq}, #{periodType}, #{specificStartDate}, #{specificEndDate}, #{monthlyDay}, #{weeklyDay})
